creator: abser.786@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 33420
Reference for Reproduce

Steps:
1.	Record our application for automating with more than 100 http samplers
2.	Group samplers for module specific using transaction controller.
3.	Add HTTP Cookie manager
4.	Parameterize 40 users with CSV data config
5.	Setup a thread group with 40 users & Ramp up Sec – 800sec
6.	Run script

Expected result:
All the users should initiate with 20sec interval and process its samplers without any issue. 
Actual result:

First few threads(2 or 3) runs successfully, after that some samplers are getting failed with “Session logged out error”.

When I do further analysis, found that for those samplers, JSESSIONID changed, how come different sessionid passed in between with a same threads. 

Note: 
1.	Our application uses JSESSIONID for session, web application itself have iframe and it calls different portal, both uses different sessionid
2.	The same test plan will run successfully for the rampup sec - 1200

PFA for JMeter Test plan 

Please have a look and provide solution for this. This would really helpful for us to proceed.

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Bugzilla is not a support forum.
Please ask on user mailing list reading this:
